Articles.Content: By chance does any one have a an accurate 3d model to print of a kerbal or a animation model? I have looked at shapeways but they no longer sell kerbal models.
There's probably some floating around Thingiverse.

You can also unpack the game's sharedassets asset bundle files to find the rigged Kerbal model and use something like https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/40056-12-17-blender-280-mu-importexport-addon/ to import into Blender, adjust the model how you'd like and then export it to a printable format of your choice.

On 5/10/2020 at 5:35 AM, Poodmund said:

You can also unpack the game's sharedassets asset bundle files to find the rigged Kerbal model and use something like https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/40056-12-17-blender-280-mu-importexport-addon/ to import into Blender, adjust the model how you'd like and then export it to a printable format of your choice.

 

Thanks  Attempting to unpack .ksp file.
